content: skill level | intermediate finished size | 48″ circumference 6″ wide includes tutorial if you re looking for a scarf that s unlike anything you ve ever seen you re in the right place the broomstick lace infinity scarf combines one of the most beautiful stitches with one of the most beautiful yarns to make one gorgeous scarf with this project you ll get lots of practice with the broomstick lace stitch a stitch that s usually regarded as an expert level stitch however with the right instruction and a little practice even a relatively new crocheter can make this scarf pdf also available for purchase
